extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Citrix Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Citrix products and versions in use are affected by the vulnerabilities CVE-2023-24483, CVE-2023-24484, CVE-2023-24485, or CVE-2023-24486.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are the Citrix products and versions affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops
extracted_playbook.description: Install Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops 2212 or later versions, or apply the latest cumulative updates for 2203 LTSR CU2 or 1912 LTSR CU6.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Citrix Workspace App for Windows
extracted_playbook.description: Install Citrix Workspace App 2212 or later, or apply the latest cumulative updates for 2203 LTSR CU2 or 1912 LTSR CU7 Hotfix 2 (19.12.7002).

extracted_playbook.title: Update Citrix Workspace App for Linux
extracted_playbook.description: Install Citrix Workspace App for Linux 2302 or later versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Successful Installation of Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the updates for Citrix products have been successfully installed and the systems are no longer vulnerable.

affected_products: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops before 2212, 2203 LTSR before CU2, 1912 LTSR before CU6
Citrix Workspace App for Windows before 2212, 2203 LTSR before CU2, 1912 LTSR before CU6
Citrix Workspace App for Linux before 2302
